import './topbar.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useContext } from 'react' import { Context } from '../../context/Context' export default function TopBar() { const { user, dispatch } = useContext(Context) // const PF = 'https://vast-plains-73739.herokuapp.com/images/' const handleLogout = () => { dispatch({ type: 'LOGOUT' }) } return (
  • HOME
  • ABOUT
  • CONTACT
    • {user &&( <>
  • WRITE
  • LOGOUT
    • )}
{ user ? () : (
  • LOGIN
  • REGISTER
) }
) }
